name: Nox (itch) (Moulya Paramesh, P B Giridharahn, GurpreetObhan)
name_original: Nox (itch) (Moulya Paramesh, P B Giridharahn, GurpreetObhan)
description:
NOX is an endless surviving game, where the main objective of the game is to search for the keys in the room of darkness and unlock the door to find your way out. During the gameplay, the player will encounter enemies, which they have to avoid in order to survive. The player can stun the enemies using the torch that will help them buy some time and cut off the enemies. But make sure you keep the torch charged.   

CONTROLS

  • WASD/ D-Pad : Movement
  • SPACEBAR/A : Charge Flashlight

CREDITS

  • P.B.GIRIDHARAHN- Programmer
  • GURPREET SINGH OBHAN-Game Designer/Level Designer
  • MOULYA PARAMESH-Level Designer/Game Designer/UI Design
